items.text: Set unique, descriptive title for each page
items.reason: Titles appear in search results and browser tabs
Descriptions appear in search result snippets

items.text: Set canonical URL to prevent duplicate content issues
items.reason: Helps search engines understand the primary URL

items.text: Add Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags
items.reason: Controls appearance when shared on social media

items.text: Use exactly one h1 per page
items.reason: H1 signals main topic to search engines

items.text: Use semantic HTML elements (article, section, nav)
items.reason: Semantic markup helps search engines understand content

items.text: Implement breadcrumb navigation with structured data
items.reason: Helps users and search engines navigate site hierarchy
Link text signals page content to search engines

items.text: Add rel='noopener noreferrer' to external links
Ensure all internal links use relative paths
items.reason: Maintains link equity within the site
